channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI Agents Are Getting Better at Writing Code—and Hacking It as Well
item.description: One of the best bug-hunters in the world is an AI tool called Xbow, just one of many signs of the coming age of cybersecurity automation.

item.title: Best Binoculars (2025): Zeiss, Swarovski, Leica
item.description: Whether for bird-watching or baseball-spotting, we break down prices and specs to find the best pair for you.

item.title: Best 6 Soda Makers (2025): Drinkmate, SodaStream, Aerflo
item.description: These sparkling water makers will fizz up your life at a moment’s notice, and most don’t need a power outlet.

item.title: Meta is adding AI-powered summaries to WhatsApp
item.description: Meta announced on Wednesday that it’s adding an AI-powered summaries feature to WhatsApp. The optional new feature uses Meta AI to summarize unread me...

item.title: 11 Best Computer Monitors (2025): Budget, OLED, 4K
item.description: The Gear team spends countless hours in front of displays while writing for you. So we reviewed those too (including a few portable screens).

item.title: Creative Commons debuts CC signals, a framework for an open AI ecosystem
item.description: The idea is meant to create a balance between the open nature of the internet and the demand for ever more data to fuel AI.

item.title: Rubrik acquires Predibase to accelerate adoption of AI agents
item.description: Predibase helps companies train and fine-tune open source AI models which will help Rubrik customers deploy AI agents faster.

item.title: Getty drops key copyright claims against Stability AI, but UK lawsuit continues
item.description: Getty Images dropped its primary claims of copyright infringement against Stability AI on Wednesday at London’s High Court, narrowing one of the most ...

item.title: How to Clean a Beer Glass for Perfect Pours
item.description: Tired of those tiny bubbles on the side of your glass? Here’s how to have sparkling pours forever.

item.title: Air quality tests around xAI’s Memphis data center raise questions
item.description: A legal group is questioning why a key pollutant was omitted from air quality tests near xAI's data center
